comments.html: Is this possible with ZBF?  SDM does not seems to provide only for limited router-generated inspection.
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: It's even easier with ZBF, you just define the policy between the self zone and any other zone.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Is it not right that you have to configure policy in both directions...out zone-self zone and self-out in order to sync the router with external ntp server as there is no inspect option only pass. 12.4(24)T...great site btw.
comments.name: Juraj Kamenny
